qas.question: Where was World In Grey created?

context: Brasília has also been the focus of <b5_0>modern-day literature<b5_0/>. Published in <a0_0><b6_0>2008<b6_0/><a0_0/>, The World In Grey: Dom Bosco's Prophecy, by author <a1_0>Ryan J. Lucero<a1_0/>, tells an apocalypticle story based on the famous prophecy from the late 19th century by the Italian saint <a2_0>Don Bosco<a2_0/>. According to Don Bosco's prophecy: <b7_0>"Between parallels 15 and 20, around a lake which shall be formed; A great civilization will thrive, and that will be the Promised Land."<b7_0/> Brasília lies <b9_0>between the parallels 15° S and 20° S<b9_0/>, where an artificial lake (<a4_0>Paranoá Lake<a4_0/>) was formed. <a3_0><b8_0>Don Bosco<b8_0/><a3_0/> is Brasília's patron saint.
